instruction: Design a dance move to express a given emotion.
output: The "Angry Arm Wave": This dance move involves starting in a standing position, feet shoulder-width apart. Next, both arms are raised out high above the head and waved back and forth energetically, elbows bent and fists clenched. As the arms wave back and forth, the body should be twisted from side to side. This move should be performed with fast, aggressive and sharp movements to express anger.
